metadata.title: CVE-2023-50431 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
sec_attest_info in drivers/accel/habanalabs/common/habanalabs_ioctl.c inthe Linux kernel through 6.6.5 allows an information leak to user spacebecause info->pad0 is not initialized.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-50431` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
